title: Rupee Rout Dims Hopes of a Strong Recovery in Indian Stocks
description: The Indian rupee’s slide to repeated record lows is finally starting to pinch the equity market, with analysts warning that prolonged weakness could undermine confidence in the nascent recovery of the $5.2 trillion stock market.
content: The Indian rupee’s slide to repeated record lows is finally starting to pinch the equity market, with analysts warning that prolonged weakness could undermine confidence in the nascent recovery of the $5.2 trillion stock market.
